title: [BUG] vulkanmemallocator is missing snprintf header
body:
I am converging debian an alpine toolchains on top of https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/3192 and ran into an error with clang-19 on debian amd64 cross-compiling for alpine riscv64:


```
error: 'snprintf' was not declared in this scope
[  424s]  2817 |         snprintf(outStr, strLen, "%u", static_cast<unsigned int>(num));
[  424s]       |         ^~~~~~~~
```

tracked it to
https://github.com/mono/skia/blob/1c3113af31028b19affaff5d71f47c920acbe4f4/DEPS#L59

which is >2y old because it's missing this patch https://github.com/GPUOpen-LibrariesAndSDKs/VulkanMemoryAllocator/commit/29d492b60c84ca784ea0943efc7d2e6e0f3bdaac
